How has your response been? Do you still need participants?

author: Angel Smith
text:
You are invited to participate in this leadership survey. This survey is specifically interested in understanding the perspective of young professionals concerning various leadership challenges and/or generational workplace issues. 
Your participation in this online survey is purely voluntary and will take less than 10 minutes to complete. Please follow the survey link: http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/NGGRQ58
The data from this survey will be presented during the ICMA Annual Conference in Milwaukee. Deadline to submit your survey response is Friday, August 5 @ 12pm CST. 
If you have any questions about this survey or your participation in it, either now or at any time in the future, please feel free to email questions to angel_r_smith@yahoo.com. 
Survey responses are confidential and will only be reported in aggregate. Feel free to forward this survey link to other young professionals. If you are planning to attend the ICMA Conference in Milwaukee, please consider coming to the following session: Leadership Lessons from the Younger Generation on Tuesday, September 20@ 2:00 pm.
Thanks,
title: Leadership Lessons from the Younger Generation (Survey)
